definition: to change production/to move over to new products
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The company has decided to turn over to the making of bikes.
sentences.chinese: 這個公司已決定轉產自行車。

sentences.english: He stressed that Renault and Nissan don't plan to convert their entire fleets to all-electric power.
sentences.chinese: 他強調，雷諾和日產沒有完全轉產全電動轎車的計劃。

sentences.english: Since our production of radios came to a halt, we have switched to the production of mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 自我們的收音機停止生產後，我們已轉產移動電話。

sentences.english: The firm has decided to switch to another line of products, which are selling well.
sentences.chinese: 公司決定轉產製造銷路好的產品。

sentences.english: The enterprise which has been operating in the red has decided to swith to other production.
sentences.chinese: 那家虧損企業決定轉產。
